alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 8:14PM MST until March 06 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range Above 11000 Feet and Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
